page.title: 14Living in Waltham St L.
page.content:
Most people who live in the village are very happy with the quiet, rural way of life. Most people find the limited small number of shops are alright for simple needs but it is necessary to visit the local towns for more variety.
The major complaint in the village is the poor{bus service}which is now worse then it was forty years ago with only four buses a day. Many people have never used the buses and do not ever expect to. The people who suffer most from this lack of transport are the young people who do not have cars.
The lack of recreational activities for the young is another complaint from many people.
